participant_1.background:
I got really sick and had to spend a week in the hospital.
My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week.
I am moving because my job at the pizza parlor is not giving me enough money.
my friends tell me that i am a neurotic hypochondriac.
i drink coffee every day.

participant_2.background:
I am not comfortable talking about my parents' death.
my family loves me , but keeps their distance.
I'm not sure if my parents would approve of my dream to go to Mars.
i think the moon landing was faked.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Pretty well, I had a nice breakfast and I'm about to go for a run. How is your day going?
It's going good! I just got back from the hospital after spending a week there.
I got really sick and had to get my appendix removed.
Oh man, that must have been scary! I'm glad you're okay.
Thanks, me too. I'm just trying to get back to my normal routine.
That makes sense. I know how that is, I had to have surgery a few years ago and it took me a while to feel like myself again.
Yeah, it's definitely been a slow process.
Well, you're doing great so far. Just take it one day at a time.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to run, I'm a big coffee drinker, and I like to spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go for walks, I love coffee too, and I like to spend time with my family and friends as well.
Cool! We should go for a walk sometime.
